reviews.review: Игра на любителя на самом деле. К сожалению, у нее нет достойных конкурентов в стиме(пятница 13 не считается - она мертва), потому оценивать объективно ее будет сложно). Багов у нее много, но разрабы их чинят, да, но проблема в том что после фикса их становится в два раза больше. Большой плюс ей добавляет наличие манов из других франшиз. (за пирамидоголового отдельное одобрение, найс асс бро. 10 осуждений из 10).
Solo para la gente que le gusta sufrir como perras

Well, if you hate yourself, it's the game for ya.

Dead By Daylight - это многопользовательский ассиметричный хоррор. В данный момент в игре есть некоторые недоработки и жалобы, например: высокий пинг (в следствие чего отличные пробития сквозь окна палетки и Крепкий орешек), баги (О да, они повсюду) и бафф выживших. С чего это выжившим всё дают на блюдечке с золотой каёмочкой, а убийцы должны х*й без соли доедать. Но в целом игра очень хорошая. Рекомендую хоть раз в неё поиграть. Меня она затянула на почти 2к часов и всё ещё не отпускает.
И вот вам ещё совет. Если вы постоянно проигрываете, не расстраивайтесь. Дбд - это такая игра, где многое зависит от противоположной стороны. Дбд - это такая игра, которая учит тебя не расстраиваться от поражений. В ней важно не то, выиграл ты или проиграл, в ней важно то, что ты всегда сможешь встать на колени и попытаться снова. А если вы такое не можете вы от неё сгорите и удалите в первые 100 часов. Вообщем рекомендую

I wish i would be able to transfer all my progress from Xbox to PC but looks like have to start over, great game.

UPDATE: Queue times are instant for killer and have been getting longer and longer for survivor because no one wants to play killer with how bad it's been getting. All the problems below are still there and have just gotten worse with time.

I want to like, and from that extent recommend, this game. The concept is cool and it's amazing to have two completely separate games interact with each other the way they do here. Both sides are very fun and the game accomplishes many creative concepts that others have just failed. But the game is riddled with flaws that just kill it. I got caught up in the honeymoon phase of this game where you really don't see these flaws and only see the cool things about the game and spent a good chunk of money getting the DLC for it. Don't be that sucker. Just stay away from this game. Your life will and wallet will be better for it.

1.) It is NOT new player friendly. If you go out to get advice it's always: oh just get this perk. That is walled behind grinding that you can't effectively do because you haven't done the grinding yet so it requires a time sink that does not feel rewarding, but more like a tedious punishment for trying to get your money's worth out of the game. I understand you can be skilled enough to play with or without perks, but it does feel very bad not having them and being surrounded by people who do, getting to see how big of an effect all that grinding really makes.

2.) It so hard in survivor favor that it quickly becomes boring/frustrating very fast. As survivor it becomes a snooze fest as you quickly come to realise that you are really under low threat and can reliably win every game. Then on the flipside, it becomes frustrating as killer because even if you do everything right, how well you did is determined by how much the survivors messed up. You can even see this fact in pro play by the fact that the highest amount of kills you will ever see is one.

3.) Incredibly toxic community. Thanks to the above bullet survivors spend the entire game trolling you if you are killer. There is no reason for them not to with how much the game favors them, but it leads to toxic behavior on reddit and such.

4.) You don't feel like a killer as killer. The whole cat and mouse gimmick the game plays upon is non-existent. You are a lame cat being bullied by 4 very trolly mice.

最新版本屠夫直接废了，我给所有玩屠夫的玩家一个建议吧。
大家先选择夹子屠夫
夹子带多带夹子的配件（一般黄袋子加白麻袋就行）
技能点出：牢牢紧握，欣喜若狂，鬼魔神龛，疯狂勇气
玩法先把夹子捡满，然后就是打倒之后背上一个人就往地窖里面送，有人扛刀就白嫖刀，抗进地窖里面挂上就把楼梯上摆满夹子，之后就稍微躲开一些看人类各种神奇操作就好，你能救走算你牛逼，救不走还是你本事不够。
我不管我能不能赢能不能涨段位，我只为了我能玩的开心，挂死一个算一个，官方不让咱们玩的开心，咱们还不能自己找开心玩么？
官方你要是这四个垃圾技能都削弱的话我就卸载游戏呗，我这可是带的公认的屠夫垃圾技能了，你不给屠夫留面子，大不了大家都不玩屠夫，让人类自己匹配去呗。
这样玩百八十不涨豆，但是能让你玩的很开心，等什么时候官方再有改动让屠夫能玩了的时候再正常玩也不迟锕。

Excellent survival horror game. As an online multiplayer experience, your mileage may vary but this is a fantastic experience for friends and fans of scary games. It also presents the unique opportunity to play as either a survivor or the killer, both of which have their respective advantages and disadvantages. A word of warning about spending though: this game is fairly cheap for the base experience but can get pretty expensive when you throw in DLC, cosmetics and The Rift (battle pass). If you don't plan on putting in too many hours, the base game has you covered. If you fall in love with it and don't mind spending a good chunk of change, the additional content is a great way to keep the experience from getting stale.
Bom e divertido, embora com muitos bugs

This game went from being nice, to being plagued (no pun intended) by bugs and glitches. The developers consistently show little care and give almost no communication whatsoever to their consumers. In the last few months alone we had the massive NFT backlash, DDOS issue (which they took a week to even respond to, to which they said little if anything), and several server crashes. I won't even go into how many times they've had to disable/re-enable maps because of how broken they became. So often these bugs are ignored, or theyre given a quick fix, to being instantly broken again within days. 

If you want this game, go for it, but if you expect a clean service without daily aggravations (from the lack of stability game-wise) then you're in the wrong spot, friend. Although I have a love from this game since 2016, I can't recommend this game in the state it's been in this year. The devs (including the director) need a serious wake up call.

Game imbalances are so awful that the game isn't even playable or enjoyable unless you play ONE side that is allowed to steamroll with ease. 

 I cannot recommend this game, nothing but a cosmetic cash grab that intentionally punishes players for not playing the very specific niche they want you to play. Already uninstalled and will be giving money and time elsewhere.

 Anti-consumer and the devs openly have displayed spite against their own customers. Avoid this and BEHAVIOR at all costs.

No other multiplayer is quite like Dead By Daylight...the killer survivor dynamic is simple on the surface but much more complex once you learn about the different perk builds and strategies of both sides. A great game to play with friends. 

Never trust a Claudette to save you or make any meaningful contribution to the team. 

10/10 Easily worth the $15, even better when it is on sale.

Honestly, a few months ago, I would have recommended this game, as I had less playtime within the game. Its a known fact that Dead By Daylight isn't really a great game, as it has more bugs than you can count, and a pretty crappy player base. The divide between the Killer and Survivor category/group of players is pretty vast, and its hard to find players who live in the middle ground of the two. The player base has gotten to be so toxic, as most of the players will either send death threats, and then the other people who send a simple gg (which a simple gg is all it takes to make my day.). Its so difficult to want to play this game, on either side, when all people do after the game is cry and complain about losing, or sometimes even winning. Now the bugs... I get that no game ever is going to be "bug free" but the problem with this developer team in question is, they don't care enough to fix game breaking bugs, so they give out free blood points as "compensation" so to speak. All this does is worsen games for future customers, and players who have been playing the game, and are now wanting to put it down, because of how bad some of the game play is. At this rate, Dead By Daylight may become more toxic, if it already isn't, than League of Legends. I am very sad to say this, but I have uninstalled Dehbadelaight, and will be waiting for VHS to fully release, in hopes that Dehbadelaight, will step their game up, and hopefully continue to succeed, for those who still like the game. Thank you for those who will actually read this <3
